projects.name: Paper Scissors Rock
projects.description: A simple game of paper scissors rock with a basic UI

projects.name: Etch-a-Sketch
projects.description: A pad that can be drawn on by moving mouse, with different color modes available.

projects.name: Clock
projects.description: A simple clock with a responsive design. Includes multiple settings

projects.name: Classic Calculator
projects.description: A responsive calculator with buttons and keyboard input support

projects.description: A library for keeping track of read books with local storage support

projects.description: A game of Tic Tac Toe for two people to play

projects.name: Ball Bounce
projects.description: A site to bounce as many balls as desired inside the browser

projects.name: Restaurant
projects.description: A website for a restaurant with nav bar tabs to switch displayed information

projects.name: Todo List
projects.description: A Todo list with support for separate projects. Todo notes can be added, edited or deleted

projects.name: Library React
projects.description: A library to keep track of the books you've read. Made with React.

projects.name: Weather
projects.description: Obtains the weather for a desired location using an api

projects.name: Battleship
projects.description: A game of battleship against a computer opponent

projects.name: Color Visualiser
projects.description: A tool for visualising colour combinations and the contrast of text colours

projects.name: Where's Wally
projects.description: A game of Where's Wally which has the goal of finding all specified by clicking on them

projects.name: Youtube Clone
projects.description: A recreation of a youtube page with just html and css.

projects.name: Sign Up Form
projects.description: A recreation of the sign up form from mint.com with html and css.

projects.name: Article Clone
projects.description: A recreation of an article made with html and css.

projects.name: Apple Clone
projects.description: A recreation of an old apple homepage to practice styling of backgrounds with html and css.

projects.name: Responsive Site
projects.description: A project to practice building with responsive design by cloning The Next Web homepage.

projects.name: Newsweek Clone
projects.description: A recreation of the Newsweek homepage using bootstrap

projects.description: A recreation of the Odin Project homepage using a custom css framework

projects.name: Image Filter
projects.description: A tool to apply different filters and styles to an uploaded image.

projects.name: CV Project
projects.description: A website to create a CV from a template.

projects.name: Memory Game
projects.description: A game made in react where you aim to choose the most consecutive unique animals.

projects.name: Shopping Cart
projects.description: A shopping cart application made with react and react router.

projects.description: A recipe manager made with react, router, redux and firebase.

projects.description: A grocery store made with express and mongodb.

projects.name: Members Only
projects.description: A forum where you can register and see the messages, but only see the author and date if you are a member.

projects.name: Blog View
projects.description: A site for viewing a blog, served by api with express backend.

projects.name: Blog Edit
projects.description: Site for author of blog to add new posts, edit posts or delete them. Secured with jwt.

projects.name: Odin Book
projects.description: A social media site made where users can connect with their friends. Posts can be created with images and text. The user can like or comment on their friends posts.

projects.name: Stock Trader
projects.description: A site that allows user to mock trade US stocks. Stocks can be bought from a list of the top shares or by searching for a companies symbol.
A clone of the game 2048 made with react. Can be played with on-screen buttons or keyboard.

projects.name: Sayit
projects.description: A forum inspired by reddit. React and redux are used for the front-end, express and postgreSQL for the back-end.

projects.name: Minesweeper
projects.description: A game of minesweeper with a persistent high score board. Created following the principles of test driven development.

projects.name: Planner
projects.description: An app split into sections containing notes, reminders, timer and stopwatch. Made with expo and react native. Production build created for android in an apk file.

projects.name: Snake
projects.description: A game of snake made with typescript and OOP principles.

projects.name: Paint
projects.description: A desktop paint app. Contains multiple selectable tools and customisable colours. Created with React, Redux and Typescript.

projects.name: Spider
projects.description: A game of spider solitaire created in react with sound, animations and persistent statistics.

projects.name: The Nexus
projects.description: A fullstack online marketplace made with react, redux, typescript, express and postgresql. Thoroughly tested with unit, integration and end to end tests.
